message: Bob, I'm offering you this valuable product for $2000000. I believe it holds great potential for your business. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1800000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to come down to $1900000. This is a fair price considering the value of this product.  What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $1500000?
